snippet.title: :) [10 Sec Trailer]
snippet.description:
Play a series of tiny games based on well-known classics, each with a unique twist and connected to each other. Race cars, hit golf balls, uncover mines, and more in this experimental action/puzzle game.

Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1425380/10mg/

Itchio:
https://torcado.itch.io/smile

The 10mg Collection (Bundle):
https://itch.io/b/619/10mg-collection
